description:
Legends speak of a powerful duo who once collected every single item, even as far as the eye could see. Secrets revealed, coins collected, challenges overcome. They say to reflect your heroes, you must reflect their ways…

The power of friendship and a love of collectables come together in the form of this FREE DLC pack containing a tribute to a modern icon of 3D platformers!
name: Kao the Kangaroo: Yooka X Kao DLC
